grants.whatIsTotalMoneyAwarded: The total amount of Dai awarded to date to successful grant applicants
grants.whatIsTotalMoneyDispersed: Of the total amount of Dai awarded, how much has actually been dispersed to date?
grants.whatIsTotalMilestones: The total milestones across all funded projects to date
grants.whatAreMilestonesCompleted: The total number of milestones completed by all the projects funded by the grants program
grants.whatIsMilestonesLast30Days: The total number of milestones completed within the last 30 days?
grants.whatAreApplicationSubmitted: How many total applications have been submitted to the Maker grants program?

meetups.whatIsTotalMoneyDispersed: The total amount of Dai disbursed to date to successful meetup grant applicants
meetups.whatisTotalNumberMeetups: The total number of meetups that have occurred whose organizer received a meetup grant.
meetups.whatisTotalNumberUniqueHosts: The total number of unique individual organizers who were given a grant
meetups.whatisTotalNumberRepeatHosts: The total number of individual organizers who applied for and were given more than one grant
meetups.whatisTotalNumberCountries: The total number of countries where meetups occurred that were recipients of a meetup grant
meetups.whatisTotalNumberPresentations: The total number of individual presentations that have occurred in events that received a meetup grant
meetups.whatisTotalNumberReportedAttendees: The total number of meetup attendees reported by event organizers through the Feedback form
meetups.whatisAverageNumberAttendeesPerMonthThis: The currently calendar year's average monthly number of reported attendees that have attended events that received a meetup grant
meetups.whatisAverageNumberMeetupsPerMonthThisYe: The currently calendar year's average monthly number of meetups that have received a meetup grant
meetups.whatAreApplicationSubmitted: The total applications have been submitted to the Meetup grants program
